item.description:
MARC J. SEIFER internationally renown author of the book
Wizard: The Life and Times of Nikola Tesla : Biography of a Genius
will appear at our next meetUp to discuss his research and educate us about the accomplishments of Nikola Tesla. Maybe we can ask him why most Americans have never heard of Tesla....

FREE
All are welcome.
DONATIONS WILL BE GLADLY ACCEPTED TO DEFRAY THE COST OF THIS SPECIAL EVENT.

WHO IS NIKOLA TESLA???
Often sited as the inspiration for Ayn Rand's, John Galt in Atlas Shrugged, Nikola Tesla was perhaps THE most extraordinary inventor the world has ever encountered.

Please join us as we discus the book Wizard: The Life and Times of Nikola Tesla : Biography of a Genius

We will also view a short film about his life and inventions. Please come even if you have not read the book!

A recent review on Amazon.com states:
Providing electricity virtually free to the entire planet wasn't on the menu back then nor is it in these "technologically advanced" times. People need to read this book to understand that there is no "energy crisis" on this planet, only a crisis of will, greed, and hubris.

This book has given me an entirely different perspective on life, technology, and the value in knowing the truth.

Join us as we discover Nikola Tesla, one of the most brilliant minds this planet has ever seen, and a man that most people have never heard of! Coincidence?????

Yummy organic snacks will be provided.
FREE!
All are welcome.

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: FREE Lecture by MARC J. SEIFER Author of WIZARD
